events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to know how I can get a refund or exchange for the product.
System has classified the customer’s inquiry as a refund request based on keywords related to refund and exchange.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request effectively.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you are looking to get a refund or exchange for your incorrect order, and I’m here to assist.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so that I can verify and process your refund or exchange?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. I have attached the photo of the item showing it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. Meanwhile, you can use the prepaid return label to send back the item.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick resolution. I will return the item shortly.
The refund process has been initiated. Please allow a few days for the refund to appear on your statement. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are reaching out one week after your refund to confirm everything was processed smoothly and if you need any additional help.
Since we have not heard back from you and the refund was completed successfully, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
